FuncDef: This command overrides specific attributes of the specified queue s MBS parameters. The MBS is a mechanism to override the default maximum size for the queue.

ParaDef.Info: The size parameter is required when specifying mbs and is expressed as an integer representing the required size in either bytes or kilobytes. The default is kilobytes. The optional bytes and kilobytes keywords are mutually exclusive and are used to explicitly define whether the size represents bytes or kilobytes. Values-0 to 1073741824.
When byte is defined, the value given for size is interpreted as the queue'sMBS value given in bytes.
When kilobytes is defined, the value is interpreted as the queue's MBSvalue given in kilobytes.
Specifying the keyword default sets the MBS to its default value.
